missions.name: Reef Rampage
missions.description: Octomurk’s feeding frenzy threatens the reef. Dodge his thrashing limbs and strike back before he swallows the ocean whole.

missions.name: Shark Showdown
missions.description: Ironjaw the reef shark won’t back down. Outsmart his lunges and prove that brains can beat brawn beneath the waves.

missions.name: Whirlpool Wrath
missions.description: Leviathan, the ancient whale-serpent, summons storms and whirlpools to guard his dominion. Outswim the current, confront the beast, and calm the raging seas.
